text: Shumashti is a Dardic language spoken by 1,600 people in Kunar and a few in Chitral, Pakistan. It is spoken by the Shumashti people, a Dardic ethnic group who are related to the Pashayi and Gawar people. == References == Category:Languages of Afghanistan Category:Languages of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Dardic languages Category:Kunar Province
title: Shumashti language
